title.narrative: Support to LIFE-AR Year 1 Establishment Phase

description.narrative:
*Note: The grant has been signed by GGGI and IIED. This idea is created for record and processing.
Climate responses have often been defined and led externally and not by the LDCs, limiting opportunities for long-term capacity building and the building of LDC systems. To overcome these pressing challenges, the LDC Group launched their 2050 Vision for a climate-resilient future: for LDCs to be on climate-resilient development pathways by 2030 and deliver net-zero emissions by 2050. LIFE-AR (LDC Initiative for Effective Adaptation and Resilience) will serve as one of the primary vehicles for driving the LDC Vision forward ensuring climate action is in-line with LDC needs and priorities.
This grant ensures support to the LIFE-AR Technical Lead to continue to technically lead the initiative and provide guidance to partners during Year 1 establishment phase.
